## PGMscore tutorial
```{r echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
  varDim <- rep(2:5)
  facPot <- c(list(matrix(1,1,2)),
              list(matrix(1,2,3)),
              list(matrix(1,2,4)),
              list(matrix(1,4,5)))
  facNbs <- c(list(c(1L)),
              list(c(1L,2L)),
              list(c(1L,3L)),
              list(c(3L,4L)))
  pgm <- PGM(varDim, facPot, facNbs)
  plot(pgm)
```
